For those of you who want to know where to put the skidrow files, just go to the icon that it installed on you desktop, right click it, click "Open file location" and then just copy and paste the contents from skidrow into that folder. If it asks you if you want to replace the files click yes

If you need to tinker with the settings, go to the TryEngine file and open it. To save scrolling, open the file and click anywhere, then hold Ctrl and press F, type in the first part of your games res, you will see details of your games config.

http://bayimg.com/MaPKMAadE

I would back-up the file first, then alter the settings, might give you better frame rates etc.

Nvm, I always replaced the files. First deleting them and then adding the skidrow files fixed it :D

for anyone having problems.

Install the crack in "C:Program Files (x86)SQUARE ENIXQuantum ConundrumBinariesWin32"

Then after that launch the game from the start menu or desktop icon. Do not click on anything in the directory folder.

I too cannot get it to run.  It installs correctly, files go into Win32 binaries folder, deleted originals first even.  Updates on everything, but when I try to run the program, I get the alert beep, and nothing happens.  Then, about 5 seconds later, a "Stopped Working" dialogue pops up, and clicking more details say "Files that help describe the problem:
  C:UsersAremihcAppDataLocalTempWER52FF.tmp.WERInternalMetadata.xml
  C:UsersAremihcAppDataLocalTempWER67F6.tmp.appcompat.txt
  C:UsersAremihcAppDataLocalTempWER695E.tmp.mdmp" 

Any advice?

If the game is crashing or not starting, make sure you install the apps shown on the last dialog of the installer -- the visual studio restributions, etc. There are several things you can install but by default none (at least on my install) are checked. Install them all except the AMD CPU upgrade if you don't have an AMD CPU. Hopefully this helps. And thanks to DibyaTPB for a great torrent. I'm having a blast with the game.

Those of you having trouble with the game crashing on start: Make sure you're copying the files to the appropriate location (BinariesWin32) and DO NOT put your name in SKIDROW.ini. When I put my name in SKIDROW.ini, it wouldn't start, but when I took it back out, it worked.

Another fix for crashing at startup...

The game MUST be launched with a BUNCH of arguments. Running with just the EXE file results in nothing happening at startup (or a crash).

The desktop and start menu shortcuts already include this...but if trying to run it from a launcher use the following command line:
"BinariesWin32TryGame-Win32-Shipping.exe" try_mainmenu -noscreenmessages -disabledebugoutputdevice -fullscreen -vsync -norc -seekfreeloadingpcconsole

If you don't know how to install .iso files, THEN DON'T FUCKING TORRENT! But because I'm in a good mood, I will walk the newbs through it.

1. Download PowerIso.

2. Download torrent of choice.

3. When download is done, right click on .iso file, go down to PowerIso, click 'mount to drive ' then open that drive, click setup.exe, and wait for it to finish.

4. After that is done, go back to the drive and open the skidrow folder. Highlight everything in there, and open the install directory in another folder.

5. Drag over everything in Skidrow folder to , Quantum Conundrum/Binaries/Win32. 

6. ???

7. PROFIT!
